title: Which Offer to choose
content:
Education: BTech IT (Tier 3)
Years of Experience: 1.8
Prior Experience: SDE1
Previous Comp: 16(Fixed)
Company: Startup
Title/Level: SWE

Offer
role : SDE 2
company: Gaming Startup(Popular Appraisal ad on tv)
Base: 25LPA(fixed)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: None
Stock bonus: None
Bonus: None
Benefits: Standard PF, Insurance
location: Delhi
Routine: wfh 3 days wfo 2 days

Company: Bank which hired a lot of tech folks last year
Role: SDE1
Base: 22
Relocation: None
JB: 3LPA**
Variable: 2.2(10%)
WFO 5 days
location:Gurgaon

I have asked the Gaming Startup to increase the offer but they said its max they can give but HR said she'll talk to internal team if something can be done.

Can you guys answer the following:
How much should be the pay difference to not join bank, I'm thinking if they give me 32 fixed or above I might join them as heard good things abt their work culture!

How is the work culture at the bank job ?

which one should I go for? 

# my current location same as well.

title: Rubrik | 2yrs exp | G5
content:
* Education: BTech CS (Tier 3)
* Years of Experience: 1.5 - 2 yrs
* Prior Experience: SDE1, FAANGM
* Date of the Offer: April'24
* Company: Rubrik
* Title/Level: SDE1, G5 (exp)
* Location: Bangalore
* Salary: 42 LPA
* Relocation/Signing Bonus: 3 LPA
* Stock bonus: 3k units (over 4 yrs, vesting of 25% each yr)
* Bonus: 10%
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 71.62 ( 1st yr), 68.62 next yr onwards
* Benefits: Standard PF, Insurance, Cab pickup and drop, internet reimbursement upto 4k/month

title: Oracle vs Freshworks
content:
YOE: 6+ Yoe

Company : Oracle Health and AI (OHAI)
Title: SMTS
Location: Bangalore
Base: 37 LPA (including pf)
RSUs: 40k USD for 4 years.
CTC: 45+ LPA (Base + RSUs)

Company : Freshworks
Title: Lead Software Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Base: 46 LPA
RSUs: NA
CTC: 46 LPA Fixed

Please help in deciding which one to join considering the following:
1. Good brand value on resume so that my resume easily gets shortlisted in future for good comopanies.
2. Learnings.
